Beck is een nuchtere antiheld: hij doet zijn werk en voert uit wat zijn oversten hem opdragen, zonder zich al te veel te storen aan hun ambities of motieven.

The Monster
A bomb threat is called in to a police station in Stockholm. 
The police bomb squad blows the briefcase to pieces and it looks like false alarm, until a baby is found inside. 
Soon, e-mails are sent out to every newspaper about the nasty situation that the police had tried to keep secret. 
Will the police ever overcome the "Monster"?
